mapper.delete: delete from cms_article_column where column_id in (select id from cms_article where site_id = #{siteId});
mapper.select: select cac.column_id from cms_article_column cac where cac.article_id = #{articleId}

select t.id, t.p_id, t.site_id, t.name, t.slug, t.type, t.is_release, t.cover_proportion_width, t.cover_proportion_height, t.description, t.remarks, t.status from cms_column t left join cms_article_column cac on cac.column_id = t.id where cac.article_id = #{articleId}
select count(1) from cms_article_column where column_id = #{columnId}
select cac.column_id from cms_article_column cac where cac.article_id = #{articleId}
